Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to transition to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' after 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' before 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time it takes the 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to be done before 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in cases where it leads to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in the fastest variant leading to payment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to the end of the process in the longest variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case
